Member of:

Advantages of working with us

Affordable Prices:

  * Competitive GPU rent pricing: starting from € 0.02 / minute

High-End Servers:

  * Enterprise servers with GPU cards: H100 80Gb, A100 80Gb, RTX 3090, RTX 4090, RTX A6000, 6000 Ada, etc

Reliable Data Rooms:

  * A Tier 3 compliant data rooms supplier, stringently upheld to ISO 27001 data center standards.

Customizable Solutions:

  * Private networks, system enhancing by adding of RAM, SSDs, HDDs and other special requests.

Secure In-House Infrastructure:

  * All our servers are under our complete control in a secure environment that excludes third-party access.

Stable Internet Connection, Power Supply and Redundancy:

  * Four redundant internet connections and NL-IX peering.
  * All equipment is connected to two UPS feeds.
  * Fully redundant network infrastructure.

Included Traffic:

  * The price includes 10TB of traffic per month.

No Vendor Lock-in:

  * Users can easily migrate data in and out, Transparent Pricing.

## How to use LeaderGPU® service

Why do clients trust us?

Trust Logos from independed companies, which confirm that you can Trust us.

We are proud to be partnered with ThuisWinkel. This guarantee that
LeaderTelecom B.V. is a reliable supplier which applies highest professional
standards and provide high quality services.

Sectigo Trust Logo confirms trust for this site and submitting any
confidential information is safe here. It confirms the site belongs to
LeaderTelecom BV and passed extended verification.

This seal confirms that our company exists and our financial statements were
verified. That is why this site is secure and safe for you.

What our clients say about us

Design and Code:

LeaderGPU® continues to offer up-to-date technology, enabling us to produce an
end-product that our clients are happy with. The technology available is
reliable and customer service has always been first class.

Overall, we have found LeaderGPU® to be a cost-effective solution for a
technology that we do not have in-house.

Let’s Enhance:

LeaderGPU® provides us with fast and reliable GPU servers for our image
processing. We use them for training and for production environments,
sometimes for fast scaling of our cloud to serve big volumes of data. Support
is great and saved us tons of work. Server configurations are powerful enough
to make sure GPU is not limited, like SD, Ram and CPU. We do recommend
LeaderGPU® as a GPU infrastructure provider.

Adriyana Danudibroto, PhD | Agfa HealthCare

I tested the platform in a search of a viable cloud computing solution to
train a deep learning network. LeaderGPU® servers are available at very
competitive prices for similar resources offered by other providers, making it
an attractive option. The customer service is also very responsive. Overall,
the LeaderGPU® server is a good option when it comes to running non-critical
computation in the cloud.

Yassine Marzougui:

The server has been very stable, and with 4 GPUs and an SSD the performance
was great! I could run multiple deep learning models, with different
frameworks (mxnet™, caffe, pytorch) and the training and inference time was
good. I used your service to participate in a large-scale image classification
challenge, so the performance helped me iterate quickly. Your support has also
been very helpful, thank you!

Amine Derragui | Lingua Custodia

The LeaderGPU® offer meets our needs perfectly.  
With their wide GPU choice, high availability and effective support,
LeaderGPU® gives us a powerful tool to enhance our R&D at a competitive price.
Simply the best offer in Europe.

Edward Aponte Ramirez | Asmadis S.A.S

We recently used the LeaderGPU®.com Servers (a Tesla and Gforce GTX 1080TI)
over a week and one day respectively and it is the best option for us in terms
of performance, because of its high bandwidth and fast graphical processing
units.  
The online chat and functionality are the best! Excellent Service and good
prices!

however all suppliers in The Netherlands are currently experiencing shortage
of GPU cards in stock.

What our partners think about us

CUDA® technology

CUDA® — parallel computing architecture designed by NVIDIA®. The
implementation of this architecture allowed to significantly increasing
performance of GPU computing.

Advantages of CUDA:

  * Using the common programming language C

  * Applying of technologies such as Parallel Data Cache and Thread Execution Manager

  * Default libraries for FFT and BLAS

  * Unification of hardware and software parts for GPU computing

  * Multi-GPU Support

  * Hardware Debugging

  * Excellent scalability to different projects

  * Special CUDA® driver

NVIDIA® H100 GPU

The NVIDIA® H100, powered by the new Hopper architecture, is a flagship GPU
offering powerful AI acceleration, big data processing, and high-performance
computing (HPC). The Hopper architecture introduces fourth-generation tensor
cores that are up to nine times faster than their predecessors, providing a
performance boost on a wide range of machine learning and deep learning tasks.
With 80 GB of HBM2e high-speed memory, this GPU can handle tasks related to
language models or AI with ease.

The NVIDIA® H100 is excellent for:

  * Inference

  * Deep learning

  * High-performance computing (HPC)

  * **GPU Architecture:** Hopper 
  * **Memory:** 80GB HBM2e 
  * **NVIDIA CUDA Cores:** 14,592 (in PCIe version) 
  * **Memory Bandwidth:** 2TB/s

Ada Lovelace architecture, featuring an astounding 18,176 CUDA® cores and 142
third-gen RT Cores, this graphics card is great for a wide range of complex
applications, while also being versatile. The amount of GDDR6 video memory
with error correction is 48 GB.

NVIDIA® RTX™ 6000 video cards are great for:

  * **GPU:** Ada Lovelace architecture

  * **Memory Bandwidth:** 960 GB/s
